Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery storage-vessel, the fabric is dark-brown in section, the interior is partially covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a burnished light-brown slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393753) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393753)
